description: Enterprise techniques used by Neo-reGeorg, ATT&CK software S1189 (v1.0)
name: Neo-reGeorg (S1189)

techniques.comment: [Neo-reGeorg](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1189) can use customized HTTP headers.(Citation: GitHub Neo-reGeorg 2019)
[Neo-reGeorg](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1189) is a Python-based web shell.(Citation: GitHub Neo-reGeorg 2019)
[Neo-reGeorg](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1189) can use modified Base64 encoding to obfuscate communications.(Citation: GitHub Neo-reGeorg 2019)
[Neo-reGeorg](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1189) has the ability to download files to targeted systems.(Citation: GitHub Neo-reGeorg 2019)
[Neo-reGeorg](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1189) can create multiple TCP connections for a single session.(Citation: GitHub Neo-reGeorg 2019)
[Neo-reGeorg](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1189) can tunnel data in and out of targeted networks.(Citation: GitHub Neo-reGeorg 2019)
[Neo-reGeorg](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1189) has the ability to establish a SOCKS5 proxy on a compromised web server.(Citation: GitHub Neo-reGeorg 2019)

[Neo-reGeorg](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1189) can be installed on compromised web servers to tunnel C2 connections.(Citation: GitHub Neo-reGeorg 2019)(Citation: Mandiant-Sandworm-Ukraine-2022)
